name: TAPIOCA
description:
TAPIOCA - is a casual 2D Shooter Game, in which you play as a kid in a park annoying the hell out of people by shooting them with tapioca pearls. 

It is your task to annoy as many people as you can, while you still are on the loose!

CREDITS-TEAM:

Gjemel Likaj : Programmer 

Marco Silvestri: Game-Programmer/Designer

Cagatay Aydin: Game-Designer

Robin Struss: Game Artist

TOOLS:

Game Engine: Unity 2019.2.11f1

Asset Production: Photoshop  

Programming: Visual Studio (C#)

CREDITS - UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES EUROPE:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof.Csongor Baranyai 

http://www.btk-fh.de/de/
